price: 41. Ama ahaadaan biyaheedu kuwa gudha, oo aad kari doonin inaad gaarto.
arabic: أَوۡ يُصۡبِحَ مَآؤُهَا غَوۡرٗا فَلَن تَسۡتَطِيعَ لَهُۥ طَلَبٗا

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.

meta.transliteration: aw yuṣ'biḥa māuhā ghawran falan tastaṭīʿa lahu ṭalaban
